role.descr: wait-er (not waiter, that's a different sense)

example.name: typical usage
example.text: Trading is expected to remain subdued as the market awaits tomorrow's release of the jobs data with the hope that it will point toward a decline in interest rates.
example.arg: tomorrow's release of the jobs data
with the hope that it will point toward a decline in interest rates

predicate.note: Frames file for 'await' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No access to verbnet. Comparison to 'wait'.
